languages.text: "В основном — геликанский кремнистый маис и красный турнепс. Кроме того, в южном полушарии мы отвели значительные территории под популяцию {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксов{/g}. Ну и, конечно, нельзя не упомянуть несколько тысяч акров пашни, выделенной под способные к брожению фрукты. Для личного пользования и ограниченного экспорта".

traits.locale_text: "В основном — геликанский кремнистый маис и красный турнепс. Кроме того, в южном полушарии мы отвели значительные территории под популяцию гроксов. Ну и, конечно, нельзя не упомянуть несколько тысяч акров пашни, выделенной под способные к брожению фрукты. Для личного пользования и ограниченного импорта".

languages.text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."
languages.original_text: "В основном — геликанский кремнистый маис и красный турнепс. Кроме того, в южном полушарии мы отвели значительные территории под популяцию {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}гроксов{/g}. Ну и, конечно, нельзя не упомянуть несколько тысяч акров пашни, выделенной под способные к брожению фрукты. Для личного пользования и ограниченного экспорта".

traits.locale_text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the grox population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

"Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the grox population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

"Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the grox population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

"Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

languages.text: “主要是赫利肯燧石玉米和红萝卜。除此之外，我们还在南半球规划了大片土地，用来养殖{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}。当然，不能不提的是，还有几千英亩的耕地用来种植可发酵的水果，供个人使用以及有限出口。”
languages.original_text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

traits.locale_text: “主要是赫利肯燧石玉米和红萝卜。除此之外，我们还在南半球规划了大片土地，用来养殖{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}格洛克斯兽{/g}。当然，不能不提的是，还有几千英亩的耕地用来种植可发酵的水果，供个人使用以及有限出口。”

languages.text: «Principalmente maíz férreo de Helica y nabos rojos. Aparte de eso, tenemos numerosos terrenos para ganadería de {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} en el hemisferio sur. Y por supuesto, debo mencionar varios miles de hectáreas arables dedicadas a fruta fermentable, tanto para uso personal como para exportación en cantidades limitadas».
languages.original_text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

traits.locale_text: «Principalmente maíz férreo de Helica y nabos rojos. Aparte de eso, tenemos numerosos terrenos para ganadería de {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} en el hemisferio sur. Y por supuesto, debo mencionar varios miles de hectáreas arables dedicadas a fruta fermentable, tanto para uso personal como para exportación en cantidades limitadas».

languages.text: 「主要作物は、ヘリカン・フリントコーンと赤カブです。離れた場所にはなりますが、南半球には{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}の集団のために広大な土地を確保してあります。もちろん、発酵性の果物を栽培するために数千エーカーの耕地もございます。自家用にも、限定輸出用にもお使いいただけます」
languages.original_text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

traits.locale_text: 「主要作物は、ヘリカン・フリントコーンと赤カブです。離れた場所にはなりますが、南半球には{g|Encyclopedia:Grox}蜥蜴牛{/g}の集団のために広大な土地を確保してあります。もちろん、発酵性の果物を栽培するために数千エーカーの耕地もございます。自家用にも、限定輸出用にもお使いいただけます」

languages.text: "Hauptsächlich Helican-Flint-Mais und Rote Bete. Daneben haben wir auf der Südhalbkugel große Gebiete für die {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}-Population freigemacht. Und natürlich darf ich nicht vergessen, dass auf Tausenden Morgen Land fermentierbare Früchte kultiviert werden. Zum persönlichen Gebrauch und für den eingeschränkten Export."
languages.original_text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

traits.locale_text: "Hauptsächlich Helican-Flint-Mais und Rote Bete. Daneben haben wir auf der Südhalbkugel große Gebiete für die {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}Grox{/g}-Population freigemacht. Und natürlich darf ich nicht vergessen, dass auf Tausenden Morgen Land fermentierbare Früchte kultiviert werden. Zum persönlichen Gebrauch und für den eingeschränkten Export."

languages.text: « Principalement du maïs corné d'Helican et du navet rouge. En dehors de cela, nous avons alloué de grandes étendues de terrain aux {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} dans l'hémisphère sud. Et bien sûr, je me dois de mentionner les milliers d'hectares consacrés à la culture de fruits fermentables, pour usage personnel et exportation limitée. »
languages.original_text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

traits.locale_text: « Principalement du maïs corné d'Helican et du navet rouge. En dehors de cela, nous avons alloué de grandes étendues de terrain aux {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} dans l'hémisphère sud. Et bien sûr, je me dois de mentionner les milliers d'hectares consacrés à la culture de fruits fermentables, pour usage personnel et exportation limitée. »

languages.text: "Başlıca ürünlerimiz Helica mısırı ve kırmızı şalgam. İlaveten güney yarım kürede {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} nüfusuna geniş araziler ayırdık. Elbette mayalanabilir meyve yetiştiriciliğine ayrılmış birkaç bin dönümlük ekili arazilerimizden bahsetmeden geçemeyeceğim. Bunlar kişisel kullanım için, ihracatları sınırlı."
languages.original_text: "Mainly, Helican flint corn and red turnip. Apart from that, in the southern hemisphere we have set aside vast tracts of land for the {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}grox{/g} population. And, of course, I cannot fail to mention the several thousand acres of tilled land given over to cultivating fermentable fruit. For personal use and limited export."

traits.locale_text: "Başlıca ürünlerimiz Helica mısırı ve kırmızı şalgam. İlaveten güney yarım kürede {g|Encyclopedia:Grox}groks{/g} nüfusuna geniş araziler ayırdık. Elbette mayalanabilir meyve yetiştiriciliğine ayrılmış birkaç bin dönümlük ekili arazilerimizden bahsetmeden geçemeyeceğim. Bunlar kişisel kullanım için, ihracatları sınırlı."
